itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former NFL star Nick Mangold to pick this week’s Conference Championship Games — plus they break down how much of a GOAT Tom Brady is, which NFL teams had the worst fans when Nick played, and Nick’s best BBQ ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by former NFL star Nick Mangold to pick this week’s Conference Championship Games — plus they break down how much of a GOAT Tom Brady is, which NFL teams had the worst fans when Nick played, and Nick’s best BBQ picks from around the country.
